EOS Knights

EOS Knights is a first mobile idle RPG game that runs on an EOS block chain. Collect materials, craft items and make knights stronger.

There are materials and item user markets in the game. You can trade the desired materials and items with EOS.

You can grow faster with cute pets. Use the holy water to get a pet.

Download

You can download for free on the App Store and Google play store.

Possible Soon

Feel free to email us to provide some feedback on our game, give us suggestions for new game idea, or to just say hello!
